content: शुभ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> शोभते {@--1@} To shine, be splendid, look beautiful or handsome; सुष्ठु शोभसे एतेन विनयमाहात्म्येन <ls>U. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 6.</ls> {@--2@} To appear to advantage; सुखं हि दुःखान्यनुभूय शोभते <ls>Mk. 1. 10.</ls> {@--3@} To suit, become, befit (with <ab>gen.</ab>); रामभद्र इत्येवोपचारः शोभते तातपरिजनस्य <ls>U. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To be gay or happy. {@--5@} To be victorious. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (शोभयनि-ते) To decorate, adorn, grace. --WITH परि, -वि to shine, look splendid.

शुभ् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Beauty, splendour. {@--2@} Radiance, lustre. {@--3@} Happiness. {@--4@} Victory. {@--5@} An ornament. {@--6@} An auspicious offering. {@--7@} Water. {@--8@} A brilliant chariot.
